title: Social media platforms must respect France’s ban for under 15s, says EU
summary_full: But on Tuesday the Commission also stressed that only Digital Services Act enforcers can impose "additional obligations" on very large online platforms
summary_public: But on Tuesday the Commission also stressed that only Digital Services Act enforcers can impose "additional obligations" on very large online platforms

FR.label: positive
FR.evidence: Social media platforms must respect France’s ban
